statements: SELECT * FROM access_control_list WHERE id = 1;
SELECT user_id, permission FROM access_control_list WHERE resource_id = 5;
SELECT resource_id, permission, user_id FROM access_control_list WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM access_control_list WHERE permission = 'read';
SELECT id, user_id, resource_id, permission FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT resource_id, permission FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY resource_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission FROM access_control_list WHERE permission = 'read' AND user_id = 2;
SELECT permission, user_id FROM access_control_list WHERE resource_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND permission LIKE 'w%';
SELECT id, resource_id, permission FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 4 ORDER BY id ASC, resource_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_control_list_table;
SELECT id, user_id, resource_id, permission FROM access_control_list_table WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, resource_id, permission FROM access_control_list_table WHERE resource_id = 10;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resource_table ORDER BY resource_name DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, permission FROM access_control_list_table WHERE permission = 'read' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_control_list_table WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT resource_name, resource_type FROM resource_table WHERE resource_type = 'Document';
SELECT user_id, permission, resource_name FROM access_control_list_table JOIN resource_table ON access_control_list_table.resource_id = resource_table.resource_id;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM access_control_list_table WHERE permission = 'Read';
SELECT * FROM access_control_list_table WHERE user_id = 2 AND permission = 'Write';
SELECT * FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT id, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT name, location FROM resources WHERE type = 'document';
SELECT id, user_id, permission FROM access_control_list WHERE permission = 'read';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users;
SELECT * FROM resources WHERE type = 'document';
SELECT id, role, username FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT id, name, location FROM resources ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, resource_id, permission FROM access_control_list WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM acl_roles;
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM acl_roles WHERE role_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT user_id, username FROM acl_users WHERE role_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-987654321cba';
SELECT resource_name FROM acl_resources ORDER BY resource_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, resource_id, grant FROM acl_permissions WHERE user_id = 'abcdabcd-abcd-abcd-abcd-abcdabcdabcd';
SELECT * FROM acl_roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM acl_users WHERE role_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT resource_name FROM acl_resources WHERE resource_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' AND resource_name ILIKE '%example%';

SELECT username, resource_name FROM acl_users INNER JOIN acl_permissions ON acl_users.user_id = acl_permissions.user_id INNER JOIN acl_resources ON acl_permissions.resource_id = acl_resources.resource_id;
SELECT * FROM acl_permissions WHERE grant = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM access_control_lists;
SELECT id, role_id, resource_type FROM access_control_lists ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT permission, resource_id FROM access_control_lists WHERE resource_type = 'document';
SELECT * FROM roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT id, resource_name FROM resources WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM access_control_lists WHERE role_id = 1 AND resource_type = 'user';
SELECT role_name, resource_name FROM roles r JOIN resources rs ON r.id = rs.id WHERE r.id = 2;
SELECT u.username, rp.permission FROM users u JOIN role_permission_mapping rp ON u.id = rp.role_id WHERE rp.role_id = 3;
SELECT DISTINCT permission FROM access_control_lists WHERE resource_id = 4 ORDER BY permission DESC;
SELECT role_name, count(*) AS total_permissions FROM roles r JOIN role_permission_mapping rp ON r.id = rp.role_id GROUP BY role_name ORDER BY total_permissions DESC;
